name: Umami
description: Umami is a simple, fast, website analytics alternative to Google Analytics.

HASH_SALT.description: Used to generate unique values for your installation

DATABASE_URL.description: URL for the database, set automatically by the add-on

IGNORE_IP.description: Comma-delimited list of IP address to exclude from data collection

FORCE_SSL.description: Redirect all requests from http to https in the Umami application

LOG_QUERY.description: If you are running in development mode, this will log database queries to the console for debugging
